meta.title: Programming Mystery Box
meta.description: A set of random tables for generating programming project constraints.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Downloads Folder
fabric_inputs.description: The physical folder on your machine.

fabric_inputs.name: API: OpenMeteo (Weather)
fabric_inputs.description: Free weather data, no key required.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: System Clipboard
fabric_inputs.description: Whatever is currently copied to your clipboard.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: A CSV File
fabric_inputs.description: Find a random CSV online (e.g., global population, coffee prices).

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Images Folder
fabric_inputs.description: A specific directory of photos on your computer.

fabric_inputs.name: User Input: Text
fabric_inputs.description: Direct typing from the user via keyboard.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: System Processes
fabric_inputs.description: Current CPU/RAM usage or running tasks.

fabric_inputs.name: Web: HackerNews / Reddit
fabric_inputs.description: Read the front page of a news aggregator (via API or RSS).

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Git Repository
fabric_inputs.description: The commit history or file structure of a local project.

fabric_inputs.name: Time: The Calendar
fabric_inputs.description: Current date, time, holidays, or timestamps.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Log Files
fabric_inputs.description: Parse a fake server log or your own system logs.

fabric_inputs.name: Web: Wikipedia
fabric_inputs.description: Fetch a random article or summary.

fabric_inputs.name: API: Cat/Dog Facts
fabric_inputs.description: Simple text-based APIs returning animal trivia.

fabric_inputs.name: Hardware: Mouse Position
fabric_inputs.description: Track where the mouse is on screen.

fabric_inputs.name: API: IP Geolocation
fabric_inputs.description: Where is the user currently located?

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Browser History
fabric_inputs.description: Export your history to JSON/CSV and use that.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Desktop Screenshots
fabric_inputs.description: Take a screenshot programmatically as input.

fabric_inputs.name: API: REST Countries
fabric_inputs.description: Data about every country (flags, currency, pop).

fabric_inputs.name: User Input: Voice
fabric_inputs.description: Record a snippet of audio from the mic.

fabric_inputs.name: API: Agify/Genderize
fabric_inputs.description: Predict age/gender based on a name.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Code Files
fabric_inputs.description: Scan a directory for .py or .js files.

fabric_inputs.name: Web: A Specific URL
fabric_inputs.description: Scrape a specific static webpage (e.g., your personal site).

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Todo List
fabric_inputs.description: A simple .txt file with line-separated tasks.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Battery Status
fabric_inputs.description: Laptop battery percentage and charging state.

fabric_inputs.name: Web: RSS Feed
fabric_inputs.description: Any RSS feed (BBC, heavily used blogs).

fabric_inputs.name: Local: JSON Config
fabric_inputs.description: Create a complex JSON settings file to parse.

fabric_inputs.name: API: TV Maze
fabric_inputs.description: TV show schedules and episode info.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Duplicate Files
fabric_inputs.description: Simulate a folder with duplicate files.

fabric_inputs.name: Web: Robots.txt
fabric_inputs.description: Parse the robots.txt of a famous site.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Font Files
fabric_inputs.description: Analyze .ttf or .otf files in a folder.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Network Interface
fabric_inputs.description: Your local IP, MAC address, connection status.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Zip/Tar Files
fabric_inputs.description: Read contents inside a compressed archive.

fabric_inputs.name: System: Uptime
fabric_inputs.description: How long has the computer been on?

fabric_inputs.name: Local: CSV (Financial)
fabric_inputs.description: Download your own bank statement csv.

fabric_inputs.name: API: Deck of Cards
fabric_inputs.description: Shuffling and dealing card logic via API.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: WiFi Networks
fabric_inputs.description: Scan for available SSIDs (if OS permits).

fabric_inputs.name: User Input: Mouse Click
fabric_inputs.description: Coordinates of where a user clicks.

fabric_inputs.name: API: YesOrNo
fabric_inputs.description: Returns a gif of yes or no.

fabric_inputs.name: User Input: Drawing
fabric_inputs.description: A simple canvas for user doodles.

fabric_inputs.name: API: Universalis
fabric_inputs.description: Final Fantasy XIV market board data.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Installed Apps
fabric_inputs.description: List of software installed on OS.

fabric_inputs.name: User Input: Webcam
fabric_inputs.description: Capture a single frame from the camera.

fabric_inputs.name: Local: Temp Files
fabric_inputs.description: The contents of the /tmp or %TEMP% folder.

logic_constraints.name: The Filter
logic_constraints.description: Remove everything except items that match a specific criteria.

logic_constraints.name: The Sorter
logic_constraints.description: Organize the data by Date, Size, or Alphabetical order.

logic_constraints.name: The Alarmer
logic_constraints.description: Trigger an event *only* if a value exceeds a threshold.

logic_constraints.name: The Summarizer
logic_constraints.description: Reduce the input to a 3-line summary or average.

logic_constraints.name: The Converter
logic_constraints.description: Change the format (e.g., JSON to CSV, JPG to PNG).

logic_constraints.name: The Searcher
logic_constraints.description: Allow the user to query the data for a specific string.

logic_constraints.name: The Visualizer
logic_constraints.description: Turn the data into a visual representation (bar chart, graph).

logic_constraints.name: The Archiver
logic_constraints.description: Save the data into a compressed/backup format with a timestamp.

logic_constraints.name: The Translator
logic_constraints.description: Translate language, code syntax, or file type.

logic_constraints.name: The Randomizer
logic_constraints.description: Pick one item from the input completely at random.

logic_constraints.name: The Calculator
logic_constraints.description: Perform math on the data (Sum, Average, Median).

logic_constraints.name: The Watchdog
logic_constraints.description: Run continuously and log changes over time.

logic_constraints.name: The Formatter
logic_constraints.description: Pretty-print the data to make it human-readable.

logic_constraints.name: The Sanitizer
logic_constraints.description: Clean the data (remove nulls, fix whitespace, strip HTML).

logic_constraints.name: The Encryptor
logic_constraints.description: Obfuscate or encrypt the output data.

logic_constraints.name: The Comparer
logic_constraints.description: Compare the current input against a previous version (Diff).

logic_constraints.name: The Grouper
logic_constraints.description: Bucket items into categories (e.g., 'Files > 10MB').

logic_constraints.name: The Tagger
logic_constraints.description: Automatically add metadata tags to the input.

logic_constraints.name: The Scheduler
logic_constraints.description: The logic must only run at a specific time of day.

logic_constraints.name: The Bouncer
logic_constraints.description: Reject input that doesn't validate against a schema.

logic_constraints.name: The History Maker
logic_constraints.description: Keep a persistent log of every time the script runs.

logic_constraints.name: The Trend Spotter
logic_constraints.description: Identify if the numbers are going up or down.

logic_constraints.name: The Notifier
logic_constraints.description: The primary goal is to tell the human something happened.

logic_constraints.name: The Renamer
logic_constraints.description: Change the identifiers/filenames of the input.

logic_constraints.name: The Pruner
logic_constraints.description: Delete the oldest 20% of the data.

logic_constraints.name: The Linker
logic_constraints.description: Find connections between two different items in the input.

logic_constraints.name: The Extractor
logic_constraints.description: Pull out specific entities (emails, dates, phone numbers).

logic_constraints.name: The Mocker
logic_constraints.description: Replace sensitive data with fake placeholder data.

logic_constraints.name: The Stylist
logic_constraints.description: Apply a color scheme or theme to the data.

logic_constraints.name: The Ranker
logic_constraints.description: Assign a 'Score' to every item based on your own algorithm.

logic_constraints.name: The Counter
logic_constraints.description: Simply count occurrences of specific elements.

logic_constraints.name: The Dedup
logic_constraints.description: Remove duplicates strictly.

logic_constraints.name: The Flipper
logic_constraints.description: Reverse the order or invert the colors/values.

logic_constraints.name: The Parser
logic_constraints.description: Break a large string into structured components.

logic_constraints.name: The Validator
logic_constraints.description: Return True/False if the input is 'Good'.

logic_constraints.name: The Syncer
logic_constraints.description: Ensure the input matches a target destination.

logic_constraints.name: The Player
logic_constraints.description: Treat the data as media (play it, show it).

logic_constraints.name: The Gamifier
logic_constraints.description: Award 'Points' based on the input data.

logic_constraints.name: The Obfuscator
logic_constraints.description: Make the data unreadable to humans but readable to machines.

logic_constraints.name: The Splitter
logic_constraints.description: Break the input into many small files/chunks.

logic_constraints.name: The Merger
logic_constraints.description: Combine multiple inputs into one huge block.

logic_constraints.name: The Grid
logic_constraints.description: Arrange the data in a strict row/column layout.

logic_constraints.name: The Timeline
logic_constraints.description: Arrange the data linearly by time.

logic_constraints.name: The Loop
logic_constraints.description: Cycle through the data repeatedly.

logic_constraints.name: The Trigger
logic_constraints.description: Execute an external command based on the data.

logic_constraints.name: The Cache
logic_constraints.description: Store the data locally to prevent re-fetching.

logic_constraints.name: The Expander
logic_constraints.description: Enrich the data by adding more info (e.g., add city to zip code).

logic_constraints.name: The Compressor
logic_constraints.description: Try to make the data take up as little space as possible.

logic_constraints.name: The Scrambler
logic_constraints.description: Shuffle the data intentionally (chaos mode).

logic_constraints.name: The Auditor
logic_constraints.description: Check for missing values or errors.

output_mediums.name: CLI: Standard
output_mediums.description: Basic print statements in the terminal.

output_mediums.name: File: CSV
output_mediums.description: Save the result to a .csv spreadsheet.

output_mediums.name: Web: HTML Page
output_mediums.description: Generate a static .html file and open it.

output_mediums.name: CLI: Rich/Color
output_mediums.description: Use a library (like rich) to make the terminal pretty.

output_mediums.name: File: JSON
output_mediums.description: Save as a structured .json file.

output_mediums.name: GUI: Simple Window
output_mediums.description: A basic popup window (Tkinter/PySimpleGUI).

output_mediums.name: System: Notification
output_mediums.description: A native desktop toast notification.

output_mediums.name: File: Markdown Report
output_mediums.description: A formatted .md file with headers and bold text.

output_mediums.name: Image: Generated
output_mediums.description: Save the result as a .png or .jpg.

output_mediums.name: Web: Local Server
output_mediums.description: A minimal Flask/Django/FastAPI app running on localhost.

output_mediums.name: CLI: Interactive
output_mediums.description: The user must type commands to navigate the result.

output_mediums.name: File: PDF
output_mediums.description: Generate a PDF document.

output_mediums.name: Sound: Alert
output_mediums.description: Play a beep or sound effect.

output_mediums.name: Clipboard
output_mediums.description: Copy the result directly to the system clipboard.

output_mediums.name: Email
output_mediums.description: Send the result to yourself via SMTP.

output_mediums.name: File: Log
output_mediums.description: Append to a .log file with timestamps.

output_mediums.name: CLI: Progress Bar
output_mediums.description: Visualize the processing with a loading bar.

output_mediums.name: Data: Database
output_mediums.description: Insert the result into SQLite.

output_mediums.name: Visual: Graph
output_mediums.description: Generate a plot (matplotlib) and show it.

output_mediums.name: File: Excel
output_mediums.description: Create a styled .xlsx file (with colors/bolding).

output_mediums.name: TUI: Dashboard
output_mediums.description: A terminal interface with distinct panels (like curses).

output_mediums.name: Web: Dashboard
output_mediums.description: A browser-based dashboard with auto-refresh.

output_mediums.name: Bot: Chat
output_mediums.description: Output formatted for a chat app (Discord/Slack webhook).

output_mediums.name: File: XML
output_mediums.description: Save as classic XML.

output_mediums.name: System: Wallpaper
output_mediums.description: Change the desktop wallpaper to the result.

output_mediums.name: CLI: Table
output_mediums.description: Format the output as a clean ASCII table.

output_mediums.name: Sound: Speech
output_mediums.description: Use Text-to-Speech to read the result.

output_mediums.name: File: Zip
output_mediums.description: Bundle the results into a zip archive.

output_mediums.name: Web: API Endpoint
output_mediums.description: Create a local API that serves this data as JSON.

output_mediums.name: Status Bar
output_mediums.description: Output meant for a system status bar (like i3blocks/Polybar).

output_mediums.name: Browser
output_mediums.description: Open a specific URL with query parameters based on result.

output_mediums.name: File: Calendar
output_mediums.description: Generate an .ics calendar file.

output_mediums.name: CLI: Tree
output_mediums.description: Show the result as a hierarchical tree structure.

output_mediums.name: Hardware: LED
output_mediums.description: Blink a keyboard light or external LED (if available).

output_mediums.name: File: Code
output_mediums.description: Generate a valid python/js script file.

output_mediums.name: Visual: Word Cloud
output_mediums.description: Generate a word cloud image.

output_mediums.name: Web: Map
output_mediums.description: Generate an HTML map with pins.

output_mediums.name: CLI: ASCII Art
output_mediums.description: Render the output using ASCII characters.

output_mediums.name: File: Latex
output_mediums.description: Generate a .tex file.

output_mediums.name: Printer
output_mediums.description: (Simulated) Generate a format ready for physical printing.
